tagline: Your reliable partner for comfortable stays and professional event spaces at the Oromia Education Research and Training Center.
languagesSupported: Available in Oromo, Amharic, and English.
pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.
selectDateRangePrompt: Select your desired check-in and check-out dates to view available dormitories.
fillFormToBookDormitory: Please fill out the form below to book your selected dormitory.
selectBothStartAndEndDates: Please select both start and end dates for your booking.
enterEmployer: Enter your employer or organization name
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your facility booking request has been received and is pending approval. We will contact you shortly.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your dormitory booking request has been received. Please find payment details above or on the next page. After payment, confirm by sending a screenshot to @oroedubot on Telegram. Your booking will be finalized after admin approval and payment verification.
errorSubmittingBooking: There was an error submitting your booking. Please try again.
fillFormToBookFacility: Please fill out the form below to book the selected facility.
anySpecialRequests: Any special requests or additional notes?
itemNotFound: The requested item could not be found.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Failed to fetch dormitory details. Please try again.
selectSectionsToBook: Select sections you want to book together.
fillFormToBookSelectedSections: Fill the form to book the selected sections.
noItemsAvailable: No items available at the moment.
dormitoryIdMissing: Dormitory ID is missing in the URL.
noAvailabilityData: No availability data found for this dormitory.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
invalidCredentials: Invalid email or password. Please try again.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to access facility booking services.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your company registration has been submitted and is pending approval by the admin.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please try logging in or use a different email.
thankYouForBooking: Thank you for your booking. Your request has been processed.
chapaPaymentFailed: Your payment via Chapa failed. Please try again or choose another payment method.
chapaPaymentSuccess: Your payment via Chapa was successful. Your booking is confirmed.
completeYourPaymentDescription: Please follow the instructions below to complete your payment via bank transfer.
paymentReferenceNote: Important: Use your Booking ID ({bookingId}) as the payment reference/reason.
uploadProofDescription: After making the bank transfer, please upload a screenshot or photo of your payment receipt.
paymentProofSubmittedDesc: Your payment proof has been submitted. Admin will verify it shortly. Your booking status will be updated upon confirmation.
errorUploadingProof: Error uploading payment proof. Please try again.
viewAndManageDormitories: View and manage all registered dormitories.
name: Name
confirmDeleteItem: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
viewAndManageHallsAndSections: View and manage all registered halls and sections.
viewAndManageAllBookings: View and manage all bookings from users and companies.
confirmDeleteBookingMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this booking? This action cannot be undone.
noBookingsFoundPleaseAdd: No dormitories found. Please add some.
noBookingsFoundAdminCta: No bookings have been made yet.
noBookingsMatchFilters: No bookings match your current filters or search term.
noHallsMatchSearch: No halls or sections match your search.
noHallsFoundPleaseAdd: No halls or sections found. Please add some.
updateYourProfileDetails: Update your account's profile information and email address.
registerAdminDescription: Create a new administrator account. This action is restricted to superadmins.
adminRegisteredMessage: Admin account for {email} has been successfully created.
weakPasswordError: Password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters.
superAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible only by superadmins.
selectDateRangeForReports: Select a date range to generate reports.
selectReportTypeAndDateRange: Select a report type below. Ensure a date range is selected above.
viewOrPrintDormitoryBookingData: View or print periodic dormitory booking data.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first.
noDataForReport: No data available for this report and selected range.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking confirmation details. Please contact support if this issue persists.
paymentAwaitingVerificationDesc: Your payment proof has been submitted. An admin will verify it shortly. Your booking will be confirmed upon successful verification.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your booking request. It will be reviewed by our team, and we will contact you soon regarding the next steps and agreement.
yourBookingRequestHasBeenProcessed: Your booking request has been processed. Please check your email or dashboard for updates.
enterDescriptionHere: Enter a brief description of the hall/section...
errorFetchingItemDetails: Error fetching item details. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToBookFacility: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book a hall or section.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Error fetching halls and sections details.
loginAsCompanyToBook: Please log in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
pleaseSelectSectionsToBook: Please select one or more sections to book.
noSectionsSelected: No sections were selected for booking.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyDashboard: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to view this page.
yourBookingsDescription: View and manage your facility bookings.
noBookingsFound: You have no facility bookings yet.
invalidDateRange: End date cannot be before start date.
itemUnavailableConflict: {itemName} is not available for the selected dates due to a conflicting booking.
errorCheckingAvailability: An error occurred while checking availability. Please try again.
couldNotCalculatePrice: Could not calculate booking price. Item details might be missing.
errorSavingBooking: An error occurred while saving your booking. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to make this booking.
paymentMethodNotImplemented: The selected payment method is not yet implemented. Please choose Bank Transfer.
idScanRequirement: A clear scan of your ID (National ID, Passport, or Driver's License) is required for dormitory bookings.
fileTypesAllowed: Allowed file types: JPG, PNG, PDF. Max size: 5MB.
errorUploadingFile: Error uploading file. Please try again.
logoutSuccessfulMessage: You have been successfully logged out.
logoutFailedMessage: An error occurred during logout. Please try again.
confirmDeleteDormitoryMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this dormitory? This action cannot be undone.
confirmDeleteHallMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this hall/section? This action cannot be undone.
viewAndApproveCompanies: View and approve or reject company registrations.
adminOrSuperAdminOnlyPage: This page is accessible by Admins or Superadmins only.
noCompaniesMatchSearch: No companies match your search criteria.
searchCompanies: Search by company, contact, or email...
myDormitoryDescription: Check the status of your approved dormitory booking using your phone number.
noBookingsFoundForPhone: No approved dormitory bookings found for this phone number.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for bookings.
paymentProofInstruction: Use your Booking ID as reference. Send screenshot to @OROTRAIN Telegram bot.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: Dormitory room {roomNumber} is currently marked as unavailable by the admin and cannot be booked.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: This dormitory's capacity is not configured correctly. Please contact admin.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: Sorry, dormitory {roomName} does not have enough available beds for the selected dates.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: Facility {itemName} is currently marked as unavailable by the admin and cannot be booked.
checkingAvailabilityForRange: Checking availability for the selected date range...
selectDatesToSeeAvailableDorms: Please select a date range to see dormitories available during that period.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: No dormitories are available for the selected date range.
noDormitoryBookingsMatchFilters: No dormitory bookings match your current filters or search.
noDormitoryBookingsFoundAdminCta: No dormitory bookings have been made yet.
viewAndManageDormitoryBookings: View and manage all dormitory bookings.
noFacilityBookingsMatchFilters: No facility bookings match your current filters or search.
noFacilityBookingsFoundAdminCta: No facility bookings have been made yet.
viewAndManageFacilityBookings: View and manage all facility (hall/section) bookings.
agreementNotAvailableForBooking: An agreement cannot be generated for this booking type or status.
enterCustomTermsHere: Enter or paste custom terms and conditions here. These will replace the default terms for this specific agreement.
editTermsNote: Changes made here apply only to this booking's agreement. Default terms remain for new agreements.
termsPlaceholder1: 1. Payment: Full payment is due upon signing this agreement unless otherwise specified.
termsPlaceholder2: 2. Cancellation: Cancellations made less than 7 days prior to the booking date are subject to a 50% cancellation fee. Cancellations within 48 hours are non-refundable.
termsPlaceholder3: 3. Damages: The Client is responsible for any damages to the facility or equipment caused by their attendees or staff during the rental period.
termsPlaceholder4: 4. Liability: Oromia Education Training Center is not liable for any loss, theft, or damage to personal property of the Client or their attendees.
agreementNotApplicable: Agreement generation is not applicable for this booking type.
accessDeniedViewAgreement: You do not have permission to view this agreement.
agreementNotReadyForViewing: The agreement for this booking is not yet ready for viewing by the client or has not been sent.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompanyToViewAgreement: You must be logged in as the company representative for this booking to view the agreement.
agreementConfirmedAndMockUploaded: Signed agreement confirmed (mock upload successful). Admin will be notified.
errorMockUploadingAgreement: Error confirming signed agreement. Please try again.
phoneForTelegramIdentification: Enter your phone number (used for Telegram payment proof identification).
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: Enter your phone number (optional, for Telegram payment proof identification).
adminPaymentReferenceNote: Ensure users are instructed to use their Booking ID as a payment reference. Verify payments against this account via Telegram proofs.
bankDetailsForPaymentVerification: Our bank details for payment verification by admins.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Sorry, you cannot book a dormitory for the same phone number on the same start date more than once.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: The booking check requires a database configuration (Firestore index). Please inform the site administrator and provide them with the full error message from the browser console if this issue persists. The booking cannot be completed until this is resolved.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: The duplicate booking check was skipped due to a database configuration issue. Your booking is proceeding, but please be aware. Contact admin if you encounter issues.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer in use. Payment proof is now submitted via Telegram.
networkRequestFailedError: A network error occurred. Please check your internet connection and try again.
userDataMissingError: Login successful, but key profile data is missing. Please contact support.
